rule: can_retrieve_and_display(Sys, S, SC) :- System(Sys), Student(S), Schedule(SC), has_current_schedule(S, SC).
can_cancel(S, SCH, CO) :- System(S), Schedule(SCH), CourseOffering(CO), contains(SCH, CO).
specify_function(R, Function) :- Registrar(R), can_perform(R, Function).
can_view_students(I, CO) :- Instructor(I), CourseOffering(CO), teaches(I, CO).
can_view_signed_up(I, S, CO) :- Instructor(I), Student(S), CourseOffering(CO), teaches(I, CO), signed_up(S, CO).
can_substitute(A, I, ALT) :- Agent(A), Item(I), AlternateItem(ALT), has_alternate(I, ALT).
can_delete(S, CO) :- Student(S), CourseOffering(CO), has_scheduled(S, CO).
must_notify(S, CO) :- Student(S), CourseOffering(CO), building_schedule(S, CO), is_full(CO).
can_enter_grade(P, S, G) :- Professor(P), Student(S), Grade(G), teaches(P, S).
can_select(P, C) :- Professor(P), CourseOffering(C), wishes_to_teach(P, C). can_deselect(P, C) :- Professor(P), CourseOffering(C), wishes_to_teach(P, C).
can_access(P, S) :- Professor(P), System(S), added_to(P, S).
can_select(S) :- Student(S), count(selects_primary(S, CO)) = 4, count(selects_alternate(S, CO)) = 2.
can_maintain(R, S, RS) :- Registrar(R), Student(S), RegistrationSystem(RS), has_access_to(R, RS).
verify(S, DEL) :- Student(S), Deletion(DEL), can_verify(S, DEL).
can_update_or_delete(U, P) :- User(U), Professor(P), has_id(P, ID). display_error(U) :- User(U), not exists Professor(P) with has_id(P, ID).
can_access_system(P) :- Professor(P). can_sign_up_to_teach(P, C) :- Professor(P), Course(C). can_record_grade(P, G) :- Professor(P), Grade(G).
can_update_or_delete(U, S) :- User(U), Student(S), has_id(S, ID). display_error(U, S) :- User(U), Student(S), not has_id(S, ID).
can_enroll(S, CO) :- Student(S), CourseOffering(CO), selected(S, CO), not enrolled_in(S, CO), has_prerequisite(S, CO), open(CO), not conflict(S, CO).
display_error(S, ST, EM) :- System(S), Student(ST), ErrorMessage(EM), not has_schedule(ST, SCH).
can_enter(R, P) :- Registrar(R), Professor(P).
can_view(S, RC) :- Student(S), ReportCard(RC), has_report_card(S, RC).
can_request_entry(R, S) :- Registrar(R), Student(S).
can_delete(S, ST) :- System(S), Student(ST), enrolled_in(ST, S).
can_assign_alternative(S, C) :- Student(S), Choice(C), has_alternative_choice(S, C), not has_primary_choice(S, C).
can_view_course_list(P, C) :- Professor(P), CourseOffering(C), taught_in_previous_semester(P, C).
can_update_offering(P, CO) :- Professor(P), CourseOffering(CO), not has_conflict(P, CO).
display_error(P) :- Professor(P), not eligible_to_teach(P, _).
can_enter(R, PI) :- Registrar(R), ProfessorInfo(PI), has_access(R, PI).
can_submit_grade(P, S, C) :- Professor(P), Student(S), Class(C), teaches(P, C), completed(S, C).
can_skip_grade(P, S) :- Professor(P), Student(S), teaches(P, S).
can_bill(BS, S, SEM) :- BillingSystem(BS), Student(S), Semester(SEM), registered_for(S, SEM).
selects(P, CO) :- can_select(P, CO).
can_view_courses(P, C) :- Professor(P), Course(C), teaches(P, C).
can_submit_schedule(S, CO) :- Student(S), CourseOffering(CO), has_prerequisite(S, CO), not full_course(CO), not schedule_conflict(S, CO).
display_error(S, CO) :- Student(S), CourseOffering(CO), not can_submit_schedule(S, CO).
can_retrieve_display(U, SI) :- User(U), StudentInfo(SI), has_access(U, SI).
cancel_delete(R, S) :- Registrar(R), Student(S), in_subflow(R, S, 'Delete A Student'), not decides_to_delete(R, S). restart_basic_flow(R, F) :- Registrar(R), Flow(F), cancel_delete(R, S).
can_view_grade(U, S, O, G) :- User(U), Student(S), Offering(O), Grade(G), enrolled_in(S, O), assigned_grade(S, O, G).
can_update_grade(I, S, CO, G) :- Instructor(I), Student(S), CourseOffering(CO), Grade(G), enrolled_in(S, CO), use_case_successful().
remove_teaching(S, P, CO) :- System(S), Professor(P), CourseOffering(CO), teaches(P, CO).
can_delete(R, P) :- Registrar(R), Professor(P), is_prompted_to_confirm_deletion(R, P).
can_modify_schedule(A, S, SC) :- Administrator(A), Student(S), Schedule(SC), use_case_successful().
can_provide(S, R, PID) :- System(S), Registrar(R), ProfessorID(PID), provides(S, R, PID).
can_access(R, ID) :- Registrar(R), StudentID(ID), provides(S, R, ID).
can_change_grade(P, S, G) :- Professor(P), Student(S), Grade(G).
can_update(S, CO) :- Student(S), CourseOffering(CO), has_selection(S, CO).
can_register(S, CO) :- Student(S), CourseOffering(CO), is_current_semester(CO).
can_update(S, ST, I) :- System(S), Student(ST), Information(I), has_updated(R, I).
can_change(R, S, I) :- Registrar(R), Student(S), StudentInfo(I), has_info(S, I).
can_verify(R, D) :- Registrar(R), Deletion(D).
delete_professor(S, P) :- System(S), Professor(P), is_deleted(P).
can_change_schedule(S, SM, SC) :- Student(S), Semester(SM), Schedule(SC), enrolled_in(S, SM).
can_update_schedule(S, CO) :- Student(S), CourseOffering(CO), has_selection(S, CO).
can_view(S, R) :- Student(S), ReportCard(R), completed_semester(S, Sem).
add_student(A, S) :- SystemAdmin(A), Student(S), not enrolled(S).
can_maintain(R, P, S) :- Registrar(R), Professor(P), RegistrationSystem(S), maintains(R, P, S).
can_enter(R, SI) :- Registrar(R), StudentInfo(SI), has_access(R, SI).
commits(S, CO) :- System(S), CourseOffering(CO), Schedule(SCH), contains(SCH, CO).
can_update(S, PR) :- System(S), ProfessorRecord(PR), has_updated(R, PR).
can_update(S, C) :- Student(S), Course(C), enrolled_in(S, C), within_add_drop_period(). can_delete(S, C) :- Student(S), Course(C), enrolled_in(S, C), within_add_drop_period().
cannot_change_course(P, C, S) :- Professor(P), Course(C), Semester(S), teaches(P, C, S), registration_closed(S).
can_request(S, CC) :- Student(S), CourseCatalogue(CC).
display_message(S, M) :- Student(S), Message(M), not has_previous_grade(S).
display_error(S, ST, EM) :- System(S), Student(ST), ErrorMessage(EM), cannot_communicate(S, CC).
can_enter(R, P) :- Registrar(R), Professor(P).
can_record_grade(P, S, C, G) :- Professor(P), Student(S), Class(C), Grade(G), teaches(P, C), enrolled_in(S, C).
can_retrieve(S, ST, CO) :- System(S), Student(ST), CourseOffering(CO), registered_for(ST, CO).
can_modify(R, SI) :- Registrar(R), StudentInfo(SI), has_permission(R, SI).
can_enter_id(R, P) :- Registrar(R), Professor(P), enters_id(R, P).
close_registration(R, P) :- Registrar(R), RegistrationProcess(P), can_close(R, P).

add_professor_info(U, P) :- User(U), Professor(P), successful_use_case(U, P). update_professor_info(U, P) :- User(U), Professor(P), successful_use_case(U, P). delete_professor_info(U, P) :- User(U), Professor(P), successful_use_case(U, P).
can_retrieve_display(P, CO) :- Professor(P), CourseOffering(CO), eligible_to_teach(P, CO).
can_enter_student_id(R, S, ID) :- Registrar(R), Student(S), has_student_id(S, ID).
can_retrieve_grade(S, C, G) :- Student(S), CourseOffering(C), GradeInfo(G), completed_course(S, C).
can_select(P, S) :- Professor(P), SelectedOffering(S), CourseOffering(O), not conflict(S, O), not signed_up(P, O).
can_select(S, CO) :- Student(S), CourseOffering(CO), available(CO).
indicate_conflicts(U, C1, C2) :- User(U), Course(C1), Course(C2), conflicts_with(C1, C2).
can_select(P, O) :- Professor(P), CourseOffering(O), Course(C), eligible_for(P, C), wishes_to_teach(P, C), part_of_catalog(C), upcoming_semester(O).
can_add(S, ST, CO) :- System(S), Student(ST), CourseOffering(CO).
remove_from_course(S, CO) :- Student(S), CourseOffering(CO), enrolled_in(S, CO).
can_add(A, P) :- Administrator(A), Professor(P). can_modify(A, P) :- Administrator(A), Professor(P). can_delete(A, P) :- Administrator(A), Professor(P).
can_modify(R, PI) :- Registrar(R), ProfessorInfo(PI).
can_access(P, S) :- Professor(P), System(S). can_indicate(P, C) :- Professor(P), Course(C), teaches(P, C).
must_notify(S, C) :- Student(S), Course(C), fills_up(C).
can_register(S, CO) :- Student(S), CourseOffering(CO), not registration_closed(CO).
prompt_to_confirm_deletion(S, R, ST) :- System(S), Registrar(R), Student(ST), is_registrar_for(R, ST).
can_retrieve_display(U, P) :- User(U), Professor(P), has_access(U, P).

can_access(S, SY) :- Student(S), System(SY), during_time(T). can_add_course(S, C) :- Student(S), Course(C), can_access(S, SY). can_drop_course(S, C) :- Student(S), Course(C), can_access(S, SY), enrolled_in(S, C).
can_delete(S, SC) :- System(S), Schedule(SC).
can_close(S, CO) :- System(S), CourseOffering(CO).
can_close_registration(U, R) :- User(U), Registration(R), not in_progress(R).
can_change(R, S, I) :- Registrar(R), Student(S), Information(I), has_information(S, I).
can_enter(R, S, ID) :- Registrar(R), Student(S), has_student_id(S, ID).
can_send_bill(BS, S, B, FS) :- BillingSystem(BS), Student(S), Bill(B), FinalSchedule(FS), has_final_schedule(S, FS).
can_create_schedule(S, CO) :- Student(S), CourseOffering(CO), has_selection(S, CO).
can_cancel(S, CO) :- System(S), CourseOffering(CO), count_students(CO, Count), Count < 3.
display_error(P) :- Professor(P), Course(C), has_schedule_conflict(P, C).
can_modify(U, SI) :- User(U), StudentInfo(SI), has_access(U, SI), use_case_successful(U, SI).
display_error(P) :- Professor(P), previous_semester(S), not taught(P, _, S).
displays_error_message(S, A, E) :- System(S), Actor(A), ErrorMessage(E), enters_invalid_name(A), enters_invalid_password(A).
can_authenticate(A) :- Actor(A), enters_name(A, N), enters_password(A, PW).
resend_request(S, R) :- System(S), Request(R), BillingSystem(B), unable_to_communicate(S, B).
can_resolve_conflict(P) :- Professor(P), teaches(P, C1), teaches(P, C2), C1 != C2, not (conflict_resolved(P)).
can_cancel(P, O) :- Professor(P), Operation(O).
lose_selection(U, S) :- User(U), Selection(S), has_selection(U, S).
can_enter_grade(P, S, G) :- Professor(P), Student(S), Grade(G), on_list(S).
can_record_grade(S, ST, CO, G) :- System(S), Student(ST), CourseOffering(CO), Grade(G), enrolled_in(ST, CO).
can_enter(R, ID) :- Registrar(R), IDNumber(ID).
can_cancel(R, O) :- Registrar(R), Operation(O).
can_select(S, CO) :- Student(S), CourseOffering(CO), not enrolled_in(S, CO).
can_save(S, SC) :- Student(S), Schedule(SC), owns_schedule(S, SC).
can_cancel(S, O) :- Student(S), Operation(O).
can_delete(R, S) :- Registrar(R), Student(S), not decides_not_to_delete(R, S).
can_cancel_delete(U, R) :- User(U), Resource(R), has_permission(U, R, delete).
restart_flow(U, F) :- User(U), Flow(F), can_restart(U, F).
can_acknowledge(S, E) :- Student(S), Error(E).
can_change_schedule(S, SC) :- Student(S), Schedule(SC), owns_schedule(S, SC).
can_modify(P1, CO) :- Professor(P1), CourseOffering(CO), assigned_to(P1, CO), not (Professor(P2), P2 != P1, assigned_to(P2, CO)).
display_message(S, M) :- Student(S), Message(M), registration_closed(S).
display_message(R, M) :- Registrar(R), Message(M), is_condition_met(C).
calculate_tuition(S, T, SE) :- Student(S), Tuition(T), Semester(SE), enrolled_in(S, _, SE).
can_send_transaction(S, B) :- System(S), BillingSystem(B), sends_transaction(S, B).
display_message(P, M) :- Professor(P), Message(M), registration_closed(S), current_semester(S).
can_retrieve(S, CO) :- System(S), CourseOffering(CO), available(CO).
can_display(S, ST, L) :- System(S), Student(ST), List(L), has_access(ST, L).
can_access_course_info(S, C, DB) :- System(S), Course(C), Database(DB), has_access(S, DB).
can_update(NewSystem, CI) :- System(NewSystem), CourseInfo(CI), not from_legacy_database(CI).
can_acknowledge(S, EM) :- Student(S), ErrorMessage(EM), acknowledges(S, EM).
